remarks: Write a group sum over a cartesian product as a double sum. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Dec-2014.)  Obsolete version of ~ gsumxp as of 9-Jun-2019.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
gsumxpOLD.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumxpOLD.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsumxpOLD.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) $.
gsumxpOLD.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsumxpOLD.r $e |- ( ph -> C e. W ) $.
gsumxpOLD.f $e |- ( ph -> F : ( A X. C ) --> B ) $.
gsumxpOLD.w $e |- ( ph -> ( `' F " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin ) $.
gsumxpOLD $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum F ) = ( G gsum ( j e. A |-> ( G gsum ( k e. C |-> ( j F k ) ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d .0. j k $.
$d A j k $.
$d B j k $.
$d C j k $.
$d F j k $.
$d G j k $.
$d V j $.
$d j k $.
$d j k ph $.
